title: 203: Getting Called Out & Called In w/ Mikayla Bartholomew
itunes:title: 203: Getting Called Out & Called In w/ Mikayla Bartholomew
description:
In today’s episode The Broads are joined by Mikayla Bartholomew to discuss their two part episode series “Conversations About Race” and talk about mistakes they made and ways they can take accountability moving forward. But first they chat about Mikayla’s background as an actor, working with the Broadway Advocacy Coalition, teaching at Columbia Law School and more (0:00 - 25:00) and then dive into the conversations about The Broads previous episodes discussing antiracism, BIPOC panels, intentionality and accountability, “Karen’s Corner”, and more. 


MIKAYLA BARTHOLEW: 

Follow Mikayla: @carpeingdiem


Check out her website for resources, ways to donate, petitions to sign, etc: https://www.mikaylabartholomew.com


THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

HOMER:Visit learnwithHOMER.com/CHATTY to start a free 60-day trial

EVERLYWELL: For 20% off an EverlyWell at-home lab test, visit EVERLYWELL.com/chatty and enter code CHATTY


ReplyForward
